moves.name: Bubble Beam
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of lowering the target’s Speed.

moves.name: On My Mark!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Defense, Sp. Def, and critical-hit rate.

moves.name: Water Pulse
moves.effect: Has a small chance of leaving the target confused.

passives.name: Aggravation 2
passives.description: Raises the chance of inflicting the flinching, confused, or trapped condition with the additional effects of moves.

passives.name: Racing Rain 2
passives.description: Quickly charges the move gauge when the weather is rainy.
